Module edu.citadel.cprl
Package edu.citadel.cprl.ast

Class AST

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cprl.ast.AST
Direct Known Subclasses:
Declaration, DeclarativePart, ElsifPart, Expression, Program, Statement, StatementPart
public abstract class AST
extends java.lang.Object
Base class for all abstract syntax tree classes.

    Check semantic/contextual constraints.
    abstract void emit()
    Emit the object code for the AST.

    Emit string representation for an assembly instruction.

    Emit label for assembly instruction.

    Emits the appropriate LOAD instruction based on the type.

    Emits the appropriate STORE instruction based on the type.

  • Method Details

    • setPrintWriter

      public static void setPrintWriter​(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Set the PrintWriter to be used for code generation.

    • error

      protected ConstraintException error​(Position errorPos, java.lang.String errorMsg)
      Creates/returns a new constraint exception with the specified position and message.

    • checkConstraints

      public abstract void checkConstraints()
      Check semantic/contextual constraints.

    • emit

      public abstract void emit() throws CodeGenException
      Emit the object code for the AST.
      Throws:
      CodeGenException - if the method is unable to generate appropriate target code.

    • getNewLabel

      protected java.lang.String getNewLabel()
      Returns a new value for a label number. This method should be called once for each label before code generation.

    • matchTypes

      protected boolean matchTypes​(Type t1, Type t2)
      Returns true if the two types are assignment compatible. (Handles special compiler internal types)

    • emitLoadInst

      protected void emitLoadInst​(Type t)
      Emits the appropriate LOAD instruction based on the type.

    • emitStoreInst

      protected void emitStoreInst​(Type t)
      Emits the appropriate STORE instruction based on the type.

    • emitLabel

      protected void emitLabel​(java.lang.String label)
      Emit label for assembly instruction. This instruction appends a colon to the end of the label and writes out the result on a single line.

    • emit

      protected void emit​(java.lang.String instruction)
      Emit string representation for an assembly instruction.
